title: Cargo Chest
description:
Bold industrial accents exude a funky New York loft vibe that makes an immediate impact to your space. The Cargo Dresser embodies true industrial design with warehouse style. It features a unique shipping container appearance, with gunmetal finish enhancing all design elements. Four storage drawers offer ample space to store your clothing, bedding, or personal stuff. Combining industrial chic with a utilitarian design, the Cargo Dresser adds a lot of energy and character to your room decor.

title: Ireland Chest
description:
The Ireland chest comes with five spacious drawers, perfect for all your foldable clothes from socks to sweaters. Each drawer features an English dovetail design with center metal glides.
